toxins.name: Lycorine
toxins.description: An alkaloid that causes gastrointestinal irritation and distress.

treatments.name: Decontamination and Supportive Care
treatments.description: Provide supportive care for gastrointestinal upset. Rinse mouth, provide fluids if vomiting is severe.
